comment: Don't take his Matlab class, there are much better professors. Homeworks were like 7hrs and quizzes were 6hrs. I never got a passing grade on any of those. I'm retaking the class with a different professor and I'm learning that yes he wasted my time and money. When the majority of the class dropped it he gave the rest A's. Just bad bru dont do it!!

Professor Vijay Goyal is an excellent instructor — patient, approachable, and always willing to help outside of class. They make tough material easier to understand and really care about student success. Definitely recommend this class as its very eye opening to FEA studies showing calculations made with the finite element method (FEM)

Professor Vijay Goyal is incredibly nice, understanding, and truly dedicated to helping his students succeed. He explains concepts clearly, is patient with questions, and genuinely wants everyone to do well. Highly recommend taking his class!”

Just make sure to do the homework and quizzes, and you are set in this class. The format of weekly homework and quizzes keeps you on your toes and prepares you for the tests. Professor is a very kind and helpful prof. If you want to really learn about MATLAB while getting a good grade, take him.
If you need improve GPA, you should take him. You will easily pass this class if you follow his guidelines.
Although the theory can be difficult to grasp, the way Dr. Goyal streamlined and simplified the theory made it that much easier to grasp. I highly recommend any student new to aerospace to take him.

Professor Vijay Goyal is very organized and clear in presenting lectures and due dates. His materials support homework well. He is very communicative through emails and video calls, and his approachable, down-to-earth attitude made learning easier and more comfortable.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Lecture heavy

comment: He's perfect if you want him for Matlab. He's straight forward and will be honest about what you don't want to hear. But, this will help you in the long run!

This professor always checks his emails and would respond in a timely. The tests aren't easy but if you study the lectures and do the practice tests, you will do well. This class is a fair bit of work but it pays off.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: This professor gave important info that helped prepare for each test and quiz that was given. As long as you keep up with the schedule you shouldn't have any problems with this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: 15 short videos a week with bad audio that you have to watch 100% of the way through at 1x speed, download the pdf from the video, then answer a question to verify you watched the video and PDF. He doesnt work with you and tests are from 6-9am on Wednesdays. He will not move them.
A great professor. There's a little bit of a learning curve to his class, but once you understand it/him you'll really enjoy it. Highly recommend
Prof. Goyal will make you earn the A, he is one of the good professors that will give you feedback, tell you how to improve, and hold you accountable. He is stern but in a good way.

this professor was awesome overall, i needed one last elective and this was my only option. i was a bit nervous but professor Goyal made this class a breeze. he does have one homework a week some are longer but he has the solutions posted so you aren't lost when doing them. class attendance isn't mandatory BUT watching lectures is! he tracks you!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: Great professor who knows a ton about aero, but make sure you stay on task, as there is a lot of material and calculus.
Excellent professor!

I would definitely take any class with Prof. Goyal. He responds to emails very quickly and gives you chances and opportunities that you may not thing you deserve, especially when it matters most. I highly recommend taking him.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Great experience with this professor

I took Prof. Goyal for Aerodynamics. He is a man who sticks by his syllabus, but is also a man of understanding. He is a very generous grader; I got the completely wrong answer on a homework assignment and he gave me 98% credit on that problem, he said "you got the wrong answer, but you were on the right track. you got your axes mixed up." 
10/10.

The only criticism I have, is that the online course format can be a little bit difficult to follow at times. If you do the homework on time, and review it for the exams, you will have no trouble at all. Prof. Goyal is respectful and responsive. You get out what you put in. Would definitely take again!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: I had Professor Goyal for Aerodynamics and Aerospace Structures. I appreciate the in-depth knowledge the professor has on the subject he teaches. He's not only knowledgeable about theory across multiple classes, but he also has good practical knowledge that can and will be used in the industry. I will definitely use his textbook past graduation.

I have had Mr. Goyal before for aerodynamics online, and the class was so-so and an easy A. However, this time, he is instructing aerospace senior design in person, which is a lot different. This class is a lot of work, but the student gets a lot of learning and value helpful our career.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--So many papers--Accessible outside class

comment: This professor is by far on the pedestal with the other best professors at KSU. I would highly recommend his course, *especially* if Aerodynamics is your first AE course. Do not doubt taking him.

Directed Study - Aerospace Structures

The lectures inthis class got me interested in the aerospace indsutry. This class takes engineering concepts and explains their application in aerospace. Lectures were interesting and detailed. If you're curious about aerospace, take this class. Professor Goyal has a ton of knowledge, engage and ask questions.

The class has a higher workload. It's very managable once you understand the system and Professor Goyal is very clear about his grading guidelines. The concepts are in-depth and really interesting. All of the notes from all of Goyal's classes are worth keeping to come back to. Detailed concepts are explained in an easy to understand method.

You get what out what you put into this class. The class had longer but very detailed lectures that had material worth saving for future reference. There is a decent amount of workbut nothing unmanagable once you work out the system to his class. Professor Goyal really does know what he's talking about and cares.

If you get the opportunity to take a class with him, I encourage you to! He has been one of my favorite professors. He gives a clear grading criteria, and lets you know what he expects of you from the beginning. If you are able to follow along by watching lecture videos and taking notes, I recommend it.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: I've taken every class that Goyal teaches and they've all been straightforward: watch the lecture videos, take the quizzes, do the homework, ask questions during lecture. Homework can be challenging but he is always willing to help. He has a ton of industry knowledge, and if you get an A, he gives an excellent letter of recommendation.
If you follow his teaching method you will know your stuff!
Professor Goyal was very helpful with questions. His exams are straight forward and reflecting from his lectures. Professor Goyal is a easy person to communicate with about the materials.

Pretty direct professor. Clear instructions and he posts his lecture recordings to his page. Gives good content and lets you know what sections the tests will be covering. Do the hw ahead of time, gives you an edge and allows you to be successful on exams. Took him for Aerodynamics, hard course but gives the tools necessary to get a good grade
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I am graduating this semester and I can honestly say Professor Goyal has been my favorite professor at KSU! He makes sure to give us all the resources needed to succeed and lets you know exactly what is expected of you to receive an A in his class. If you pay attention and check d2l regularly, you should have no problem passing his classes.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: The class itself can be very rigorous, even by ME standards, but Mr. Goyal is a more than fair grader and lecturer and does his best to give a overhead understanding of the material while being respectable. So long as you apply yourself to a sufficient degree, the class is very do-able

Great professor who is always available to be reached by students. 

Large amount of prerecorded lectures but the course structure is very organized and straight forward. 

Would 100% take again or take another class with this Professor!

He will reply back quick to your emails. The class is hard, but if you put in the time and effort to study and complete the homework you will do well. If you get a B+ or an A in the class, he will give you a letter of recommendation.

Professor Goyal is a tough grader, however he gives many opportunities for extra credit. If you participate and regularly keep up with the material in d2l, he provides all the information and tools necessary to pass with flying colors. I think the difficulty of the material gives him a bad rep on these ratings even though he is a great instructor.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Goyal is very experienced in the subject of aerospace structures. Be has an easy online class set up that sets you up for success.

I'll start off by saying that if you're looking for an easy A, this is not you're class. If you genuinely want to learn about engineering, I highly recommend taking Goyal. Doing well in this course is simple, do the work. He lays out everything for the entire semester at the beginning. Tests and homework are hard but doable.

I have taken a few classes with Goyal, and he is aknowledgeable Professor. His lectures are detailed and interesting. His homeworks are insanely hard but he posts a solution which you basically just follow along as you do the homework. If the homework is a 5 / 5 of difficulty the tests would be 2 or 3 / 5 depending on the content.

This class is Hard. I've friend that failed with different professor. HW is nightmare. Super long and hard to keep up. But exam is way easier than what he requires us to learn du the semester. Not an easy class. You gotta work hard. I mean really hard. Since unlimited try on quiz get those points and put some extra effort on exam and u will pass!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: His videos are very detailed and very specific. If you reach out to him he will get back to you and he is always available to give you assistance. He is an amazing teacher!! If you have the opportunity to take him, he has been able to help me and I feel like I have learned a lot. I hope that I am able to take a class with him again. do your work!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Goyal really cares about his students and imparting the knowledge of machine design onto his students. His recorded lectures are great, very clear and detailed on all topics. If you ask questions in a professional manner and make an effort, he will answer and help guide you. He wants you to think, be prepared for a heavy workload!

Prof. Goyal was a great professor that really cares about his students! Machine Design was probably the hardest class of my academic career but I learned so much. The homework is long and difficult, but the tests are easy by comparison. Do not take this class if you expect a low effort A, only do so if you want to be a better engineer. Good luck!

Mid-low tier machine design professor. His lectures are definitely acceptable but his grading is very tough. He also holds a very high opinion of himself, in his eyes, he can do no wrong despite having blatant errors in his tests that he's too proud to make right by the students. Take him if you have to, but most professors are a better option.

This is a class where you are tested for your obedience instead of your knowledge of the subject. He requires an irrationally heavy amount of work. His notes are littered with mistakes, and he has a mindset of "I'm the instructor so I'm always right." Machine Design is an important section of the FE exam, and he doesn't do a good job of teaching it

Professor Goyal has a different teaching style than most. I would say he cares more about teaching you the subject then all negative reviews show. I took him for machine design previously and spent hours on his homework, but I learned machine design. If you want to learn a subject then take professor Goyal, if you want a grade handout then do not.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: I understand that machine design is a tough class, but he makes it unbearable. He is the most incompetent prof I have ever taken. He constantly makes mistakes and when he gets called out he says it's our fault because we should've corrected him. Avoid him at all costs if you want to have a life outside of this class.

Professor Goyal isn't a bad person. But He made me dislike his Machine Design class. So much hw, most group protect that reflects your grade. What I learned from his class is just stick with the smart kids, copy their hw and you'll pass. With all the hard work I did I still received a low grade. There are better Machine design professors.

Professor Goyal was awesome for Aerospace Structures! This semester was a weird one because of COVID-19 but he made it work. The class is largely discussion/anecdote based. The only grades were two exams (that he gave us the answers to) and a long final report (30 pages) that he let us work on together as a class. Good class if you like Aero stuff.

Professor Goyal holds extensive real world experience and is only too happy to share it with you. His homework, while equally as extensive, is an invaluable tool for helping you learn. You must go to class every single day and the textbook is heavily used for reference material. 10/10 would highly recommend taking Professor Goyal.

He gives 2 multiple choice exams ( 2 parts each ) , a final and he will drop lowest exam grade. You need to be in his class everyday. Homework was hard at the beginning, but will be easy as the semester goes. I recommend him for machine design.
